name: Kampfbal
description:
Version 0.0001 - VERY EARLY ALPHA

In an alternate future where dodgeball, not soccer, became the dominate global sport, you have ended up with a team. Trade players, arrange matches, develop your facilities and staff, etc.

...or at least that is the goal. So far I've focused primarily on getting a decent-looking game sim going. If you'd like to take a peek and try and break it for me I'd greatly appreciate it.  Thanks for the look.
